about.details:
Incorporated in 2007, Dynamic Cables Limited is Jaipur, Rajasthan based manufacturer of Cables and Conductors. Company manufacture Low Voltage and High Voltage Power Cables, Aerial Bunched Cables, All Aluminium Conductor, All Aluminium Alloy Conductor, Aluminium conductor steel reinforced Conductors and Service Drop Cables used for transmission and distribution of Electricity.

Dynamic Cables has three manufacturing units located in Jaipur. Company Design, Development, Manufacture, Testing and Supply the Cables.

The products by the company are used in Industrial, Exports, Turnkey projects, Power Distribution Companies; Infrastructure works etc. in India and abroad. Dynamic Cables exports its products to countries including Kenya, Tanzania, TOGO, Nigeria, Benin, Uganda, Rwanda, NEPAL, Mauritius, Afghanistan, Jordan, Dubai etc.

contactDetails.full_address: Dynamic Cables Limited, F-260 Road No. 13 VKI Area, Jaipur 302013

faqs.question: What is the Dynamic Cables IPO?
faqs.answer:
Dynamic Cables IPO is a SME IPO of 5844000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹23.38 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹40 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on December 4, 2017, and closes on December 6, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Dynamic Cables IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Dynamic Cables IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Dynamic Cables IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Dynamic Cables IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Dynamic Cables IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Dynamic Cables IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Dynamic Cables IPO opens on December 4, 2017 and closes on December 6, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Dynamic Cables IPO?
faqs.answer: Dynamic Cables IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Dynamic Cables IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Dynamic Cables IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
